attributes.action: To create a Fund to invest North Sea Oil revenue for future generations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Norway has at present $250 billion set aside from 30 years Oil/Gas tax revenue invested in a 'Sovereign Wealth Fund' designed to allow future generations to benefit from the finite tax revenue generated by North Sea Oil and Gas. At present they can call upon $15 billion a year just in interest. Britain should do the same now.
